import * as expectedResults from 'src/app/entity/mockLocationData';

timeline.bodyText: If you use "==" operands, it doesn't check the type but instead convert everything to number and compare, so I think '' == 0, you may need only two comparison here: locationId == 0 || locationiD == null.
